title: Is there a program which can allow me to transfer to na and get below 100ping?
body: I really want to tranfer to na, that server is better than Oce, our community is horrible and you cant climb at all. So i want to know if there is a program which will allow me to get at least below 100ping.

replies.body: I think Qantas has a program but it's pretty expensive.
Do you have a link for it?

I can't believe you took that seriously, go with Jetstar, cheaper and same company anyway.

Don't think under 100 ping to NA is possible with present day technology.
i mean an actuall program not a flight line crap
Maylasia Airlines can help but they don't normally go that 'route'.
Rofl lol bring a parachute
My face when I saw your comment: {{champion:30}}

Unless you get a program which hacks into Riot servers in order to make you host, there is no program.
And if there were, you'd lag everyone else and get banned for exploits.
You could check out flight prices through Virgin Airlines though.
Virgin airlines are usually quite expensive I would stick to jetstar, or if you want to go one level down I heard there's one called Tiger

I'd have to work out the exact distance but I think even with the shortest straight line connection via fibre optics with 0% degradation and no processing delays, you maybe still couldn't get 100 ping.

unless someone wants to find straight line distance from say brisbane to LA, I ceebs looking myself.

So basically OP needs to invent faster than light communications

A program that can lower your ping by half? Is it run by your ISP or something because that's the stupidest %%%% I've heard today. I bet you download RAM too.

You can't climb because you're bad. Not even a "program" can adjust that attitude.
Exactly, I'm a 18 year old russian girl in your local area looking for some fun
Hahaha is your name Dasha?
Please, call me Victor Ivan Dmitri Scholevlinech or Stalin for short.
Meanwhile OP attempts to hack oxygen

You do realize what a ping is yes?? not sure if troll or serious.


oh and incase you are serious, no, i do not think that a program exists that can change the laws of physics.

Connect to NA with below 100 ping, I don't think it's possible, at least not in the current stage of today's technology.

Ping is mostly a product of the physical distance between the client and the server and there is nothing you can do to remove it, you can reduce it but the base amount will always be there (from OCE to NA the base is prob already more than 100 - 150). 

Let alone downloading something to solve it.
kek
but on NA you'd just drop cause you're bad and the ping is %%%%.

LOL. NA is worse than OCE, you are delusional to think otherwise.

Sure this is a way to get under 100 ping. You would need someone from NA to log on to your account, then you just use remote assistance. The in-game ping would almost certainly be under 100 ping. :)
